game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you will embark on a journey to explore forgotten ruins in search of a legendary artifact. Uncover clues, solve puzzles, and face challenges along the way.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins.
task.description: Speak with the village elder to learn about the location of the ancient ruins.
Defeat the guardian beast protecting the entrance to the ruins.
